001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
012import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
013
014import java.io.IOException;
015import java.net.MalformedURLException;
016import java.net.URI;
017import java.net.URISyntaxException;
018import java.net.URL;
019import java.nio.file.Path;
020import java.util.Collection;
021import java.util.Deque;
022import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
023import java.util.LinkedList;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.stream.Collectors;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029public abstract class AbstractLoader<T> implements ILoader<T> {
030  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(AbstractLoader.class);
031
032  @NonNull
033  private final Map<URI, T> cache = new LinkedHashMap<>(); // NOPMD - intentional
034
035  @Override
036  @NonNull
037  public Collection<T> getLoadedResources() {
038    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableCollection(ObjectUtils.notNull(cache.values()));
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Retrieve a mapping of resource URIs to the associated loaded resource.
043   *
044   * @return the mapping
045   */
046  @NonNull
047  protected Map<URI, T> getCachedEntries() {
048    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(cache);
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  @NonNull
053  public T load(@NonNull URI resource) throws MetaschemaException, IOException {
054    if (!resource.isAbsolute()) {
055      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("The URI '%s' must be absolute.", resource.toString()));
056    }
057    return loadInternal(resource, new LinkedList<>());
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Load a resource from the specified path.
062   *
063   * @param path
064   *          the resource to load
065   * @return the loaded instance for the specified resource
066   * @throws MetaschemaException
067   *           if an error occurred while processing the resource
068   * @throws IOException
069   *           if an error occurred parsing the resource
070   */
071  @Override
072  @NonNull
073  public T load(@NonNull Path path) throws MetaschemaException, IOException {
074    // use toURL to normalize the URI
075    return load(ObjectUtils.notNull(path.toAbsolutePath().normalize().toUri().toURL()));
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Loads a resource from the specified URL.
080   *
081   * @param url
082   *          the URL to load the resource from
083   * @return the loaded instance for the specified resource
084   * @throws MetaschemaException
085   *           if an error occurred while processing the resource
086   * @throws IOException
087   *           if an error occurred parsing the resource
088   */
089  @Override
090  @NonNull
091  public T load(@NonNull URL url) throws MetaschemaException, IOException {
092    try {
093      URI resource = url.toURI();
094      return loadInternal(ObjectUtils.notNull(resource), new LinkedList<>());
095    } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {
096      // this should not happen
097      LOGGER.error("Invalid url", ex);
098      throw new IOException(ex);
099    }
100  }
101
102  /**
103   * Loads a resource from the provided URI.
104   * <p>
105   * If the resource imports other resources, the provided
106   * {@code visitedResources} can be used to track circular imports. This is
107   * useful when this method recurses into included resources.
108   * <p>
109   * Previously loaded resources are provided by the cache. This method will add
110   * the resource to the cache after all imported resources have been loaded.
111   *
112   * @param resource
113   *          the resource to load
114   * @param visitedResources
115   *          a LIFO queue representing previously visited resources in an import
116   *          chain
117   * @return the loaded resource
118   * @throws MetaschemaException
119   *           if an error occurred while processing the resource
120   * @throws MalformedURLException
121   *           if the provided URI is malformed
122   * @throws IOException
123   *           if an error occurred parsing the resource
124   */
125  @NonNull
126  protected T loadInternal(@NonNull URI resource, @NonNull Deque<URI> visitedResources)
127      throws MetaschemaException, MalformedURLException, IOException {
128    // first check if the current resource has been visited to prevent cycles
129    if (visitedResources.contains(resource)) {
130      throw new MetaschemaException("Cycle detected in metaschema includes for '" + resource + "'. Call stack: '"
131          + visitedResources.stream().map(URI::toString).collect(Collectors.joining(",")));
132    }
133
134    T retval = cache.get(resource);
135    if (retval == null) {
136      LOGGER.info("Loading '{}'", resource);
137
138      try {
139        visitedResources.push(resource);
140        retval = parseResource(resource, visitedResources);
141      } finally {
142        visitedResources.pop();
143      }
144      cache.put(resource, retval);
145    } else {
146      if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
147        LOGGER.debug("Found resource in cache '{}'", resource);
148      }
149    }
150    return ObjectUtils.notNull(retval);
151  }
152
153  /**
154   * Parse the provided {@code resource}.
155   *
156   * @param resource
157   *          the resource to parse
158   * @param visitedResources
159   *          a stack representing previously parsed resources imported by the
160   *          provided {@code resource}
161   * @return the parsed resource
162   * @throws IOException
163   *           if an error occurred while parsing the resource
164   */
165  protected abstract T parseResource(@NonNull URI resource, @NonNull Deque<URI> visitedResources)
166      throws IOException;
167
168}
